doc.title: Little Algy's Glorious Fourth of July
doc.plot: This is a very amusing story in three scenes. Scene 1. -- Algy purchases a large stock of fireworks at the store. Scene 2. -- Algy places his stock of fireworks on the ground and lights a cannon firecracker. It explodes the entire lot and there is a grand mix up of Algy and the fireworks. Scene 3. -- Algy is in bed attended by his mother and family physician. He is swathed in bandages from head to foot.
